result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.html: Tá ainmneacha difriúla orthuThey have different names.
result.ponchtml: Tá ainmneaċa difriúla orṫuThey have different names.
